profileText: a Representative from Missouri; born in Springfield, Greene County, Mo., October 2, 1976; graduated from Parkview High School, Springfield, Mo., 1995; B.A., Missouri State University, Springfield, Mo.; M.B.A., Missouri State University, Springfield, Mo., 2002; financial analyst; tax consultant; software engineer; member of the Missouri state house of representatives, 2009-2017; member of the Missouri state senate, 2019-2023; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-present).
